trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the anarch can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The anarch deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Spiked Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands.
